mapper.select: SELECT t.id, t.order_id as orderId, t.`order`, t.`name`, t.`code`, t.bx_date as bxDate, t.jf_date as jfDate, t.bx_money as bxMoney, t.bx_fee as bxFee, t.zjbf, t.bfxj FROM order_sx_bxsx t where ORDER_ID = #{ORDER_ID}

SELECT t.person_id as person_id, t.order_id as orderId, t.beneficial_rate as beneficialRate, t.beneficial_name as beneficialName, t.sex, t.birth_date as birthDate, t.relationship, t.cert_type as certType, t.cert_no as certNo, t.validity_date as validityDate, t.residential_address as residentialAddress, t.province, t.city, t.country, t.beneficiary_order as beneficiaryOrder, t.create_time as createTime, t.description, t.remark1, t.remark2, t.remark3 FROM beneficial t where ORDER_ID = #{ORDER_ID}

SELECT t.ORDER_ID AS orderId, t.ORDER_NO AS orderNo, t.ORDER_TYPE AS orderType, t.TB_START_TIME AS tbStartTime, t.TB_END_TIME AS tbEndTime, t.ORDER_FLAG AS orderFlag, t.MERCHANT_ID AS merchantId, t.PRINT_FLAG AS printFlag, t.COMMISSION_FLAG AS commissionFlag, t.CHECKOUT_FLAG AS checkoutFlag, t.GIFT_FLAG AS giftFlag, t.BXGSZXSQYJBL AS bxgszxsqyjbl, t.BXGSZXSQYJ AS bxgszxsqyj, t.BXGSFX1SQYJBL AS bxgsfx1sqyjbl, t.BXGSFX1SQYJ AS bxgsfx1sqyj, t.BXGSFX2SQYJBL AS bxgsfx2sqyjbl, t.BXGSFX2SQYJ AS bxgsfx2sqyj, t.BXGSKPYJBL AS bxgskpyjbl, t.BXGSKPYJ AS bxgskpyj, t.GSGLFJE AS gsglfje, t.GSGLFBL AS gsglfbl, t.GSTCJE AS gstcje, t.GSTCBL AS gstcbl, t.GSJSJE AS gsjsje, t.GSJSBL AS gsjsbl, t.POLICYHOLDER_ID AS policyholderId, t.INSURED_ID AS insuredId, t.BENEFICIARY_ID AS beneficiaryId, t.JFPL AS jfpl, t.SFZDXJ AS sfzdxj, t.SQJFFS AS sqjffs, t.XQJFFS AS xqjffs, t.KHHMC AS khhmc, t.YHZH AS yhzh, t.BFHJ AS bfhj, t.HLLQFS AS hllqfs, t.LQFS AS lqfs, t.HLLQNL AS hllqnl, t.HLLQSJ AS hllqsj, t.HLLQLX AS hllqlx, t.SFZDZF AS sfzdzf, t.TZLJBXTX AS tzljbxtx, t.TBRSG AS tbrsg, t.TBRTZ AS tbrtz, t.BBRSG AS bbrsg, t.BBRTZ AS bbrtz, t.MTXY AS mtxy, t.XYSJ AS xysj, t.YJZL AS yjzl, t.MTYJ AS mtyj, t.YJSJ AS yjsj, t.HYSJ AS hysj, t.CSSG AS cssg, t.CSTZ AS cstz, t.SPGSMC AS spgsmc, t.SPRQ AS sprq, t.SPJE AS spje, t.SPSY AS spsy, t.JZLX AS jzlx, t.JZQFRQ AS jzqfrq, t.JZJL AS jzjl, t.CLYT AS clyt, t.CLLX AS cllx, t.JZGJ AS jzgj, t.JZYY AS jzyy, t.JZZLSJ AS jzzlsj, t.TXWSX1 AS txwsx1, t.BXWSX1 AS bxwsx1, t.TXWSX2 AS txwsx2, t.BXWSX2 AS bxwsx2, t.TXWSX3 AS txwsx3, t.BXWSX3 AS bxwsx3, t.TXWSX4 AS txwsx4, t.BXWSX4 AS bxwsx4, t.TXWSX6 AS txwsx6, t.BXWSX6 AS bxwsx6, t.TXWSX7 AS txwsx7, t.BXWSX7 AS bxwsx7, t.TXWSX8 AS txwsx8, t.TXWSX9 AS txwsx9, t.TXWSX11 AS txwsx11, t.TXWSX12 AS txwsx12, t.TXWSX13 AS txwsx13, t.TXWSX14 AS txwsx14, t.TXWSX15 AS txwsx15, t.TXWSX16 AS txwsx16, t.TXWSX17 AS txwsx17, t.TXWSX18 AS txwsx18, t.TXWSX19 AS txwsx19, t.TXWSX20 AS txwsx20, t.BXWSX8 AS bxwsx8, t.BXWSX9 AS bxwsx9, t.BXWSX11 AS bxwsx11, t.BXWSX12 AS bxwsx12, t.BXWSX13 AS bxwsx13, t.BXWSX14 AS bxwsx14, t.BXWSX15 AS bxwsx15, t.BXWSX16 AS bxwsx16, t.BXWSX17 AS bxwsx17, t.BXWSX18 AS bxwsx18, t.BXWSX19 AS bxwsx19, t.BXWSX20 AS bxwsx20, t.TXWSX5A AS txwsx5a, t.TXWSX5B AS txwsx5b, t.TXWSX5C AS txwsx5c, t.TXWSX5D AS txwsx5d, t.TXWSX5E AS txwsx5e, t.TXWSX5F AS txwsx5f, t.TXWSX5G AS txwsx5g, t.TXWSX5H AS txwsx5h, t.TXWSX5I AS txwsx5i, t.TXWSX5J AS txwsx5j, t.TXWSX5K AS txwsx5k, t.BXWSX5A AS bxwsx5a, t.BXWSX5B AS bxwsx5b, t.BXWSX5C AS bxwsx5c, t.BXWSX5D AS bxwsx5d, t.BXWSX5E AS bxwsx5e, t.BXWSX5F AS bxwsx5f, t.BXWSX5G AS bxwsx5g, t.BXWSX5H AS bxwsx5h, t.BXWSX5I AS bxwsx5i, t.BXWSX5J AS bxwsx5j, t.BXWSX5K AS bxwsx5k, t.TXWSX10A AS txwsx10a, t.TXWSX10B AS txwsx10b, t.TXWSX10C AS txwsx10c, t.BXWSX10A AS bxwsx10a, t.BXWSX10B AS bxwsx10b, t.BXWSX10C AS bxwsx10c, t.TXWSX11A AS txwsx11a, t.TXWSX11B AS txwsx11b, t.BXWSX11A AS bxwsx11a, t.BXWSX11B AS bxwsx11b, t.TBRNSR AS tbrnsr, t.TBRSRLY AS tbrsrly, t.BBRNSR AS bbrnsr, t.BBRSRLY AS bbrsrly, t.INSURANCE_COMPANY_ID AS insuranceCompanyId, t.OPERATOR AS operator, t.TBFS AS tbfs, t.JZX AS jzx, t.ZXS AS zxs, t.JFX1 AS jfx1, t.FXS1 AS fxs1, t.JFX2 AS jfx2, t.FXS2 AS fxs2, t.SALES_MAN_COMMISSION AS salesManCommission, t.SALES_MAN AS salesMan, t.YJZFDX AS yjzfdx, t.ZXYJBL AS zxyjbl, t.ZXYJJE AS zxyjje, t.FXYJBL1 AS fxyjbl1, t.FXYJJE1 AS fxyjje1, t.FXYJBL2 AS fxyjbl2, t.FXYJJE2 AS fxyjje2, t.ZHJRJBL AS zhjrjbl, t.ZHJRJJE AS zhjrjje, t.BXGSDQJL AS bxgsdqjl, t.SFYLP AS sfylp, t.LPNR AS lpnr, t.RECORDER AS recorder, t.RECORDERID AS recorderid, t.RECORDERTC AS recordertc, t.CREATE_TIME AS createTime, t.UPDATE_TIME AS updateTime, t.UPDATE_USER AS updateUser, t.REMARK1 AS remark1, t.REMARK2 AS remark2, t.REMARK3 AS remark3, t.DDR AS ddr, t.DD_DATE AS ddDate, t.BGSML AS bgsml, t.SJZFYJ AS sjzfyj, t.YJZFSJ AS yjzfsj, t.YJZFR AS yjzfr, i.insurer_name as insuranceCompany, i.insurer_phone as insuranceCompanyTel, o.user_name as policyholder, s.user_name as salesManName, b.name as operatorName, p.name as updateUserName, pa.name as tbfsName FROM order_sx t LEFT JOIN policyholder o ON t.policyholder_id = o.pid LEFT JOIN t_insurer i ON t.insurance_company_id = i.id LEFT JOIN sales_man s ON t.sales_man = s.id LEFT JOIN user b ON t.OPERATOR = b.id LEFT JOIN user p ON t.update_user = p.id LEFT JOIN parameter pa ON t.tbfs = pa.id
t.order_flag <> #{orderFlag}

SELECT t.ORDER_ID AS orderId, t.ORDER_NO AS orderNo, t.ORDER_TYPE AS orderType, t.TB_START_TIME AS tbStartTime, t.TB_END_TIME AS tbEndTime, t.ORDER_FLAG AS orderFlag, t.MERCHANT_ID AS merchantId, t.PRINT_FLAG AS printFlag, t.COMMISSION_FLAG AS commissionFlag, t.CHECKOUT_FLAG AS checkoutFlag, t.GIFT_FLAG AS giftFlag, t.BXGSZXSQYJBL AS bxgszxsqyjbl, t.BXGSZXSQYJ AS bxgszxsqyj, t.BXGSFX1SQYJBL AS bxgsfx1sqyjbl, t.BXGSFX1SQYJ AS bxgsfx1sqyj, t.BXGSFX2SQYJBL AS bxgsfx2sqyjbl, t.BXGSFX2SQYJ AS bxgsfx2sqyj, t.BXGSKPYJBL AS bxgskpyjbl, t.BXGSKPYJ AS bxgskpyj, t.GSGLFJE AS gsglfje, t.GSGLFBL AS gsglfbl, t.GSTCJE AS gstcje, t.GSTCBL AS gstcbl, t.GSJSJE AS gsjsje, t.GSJSBL AS gsjsbl, t.POLICYHOLDER_ID AS policyholderId, t.INSURED_ID AS insuredId, t.BENEFICIARY_ID AS beneficiaryId, t.JFPL AS jfpl, t.SFZDXJ AS sfzdxj, t.SQJFFS AS sqjffs, t.XQJFFS AS xqjffs, t.KHHMC AS khhmc, t.YHZH AS yhzh, t.BFHJ AS bfhj, t.HLLQFS AS hllqfs, t.LQFS AS lqfs, t.HLLQNL AS hllqnl, t.HLLQSJ AS hllqsj, t.HLLQLX t.BXWSX4 AS bxwsx4, t.TXWSX6 AS txwsx6, t.BXWSX6 AS bxwsx6, t.TXWSX7 AS txwsx7, t.BXWSX7 AS bxwsx7, t.TXWSX8 AS txwsx8, t.TXWSX9 AS txwsx9, t.TXWSX11 AS txwsx11, t.TXWSX12 AS txwsx12, t.TXWSX13 AS bxwsx19, t.BXWSX20 AS bxwsx20, t.TXWSX5A AS txwsx5a, t.TXWSX5B AS txwsx5b, t.TXWSX5C AS txwsx5c, t.TXWSX5D AS txwsx5d, t.TXWSX5E AS txwsx5e, t.TXWSX5F AS txwsx5f, t.TXWSX5G AS txwsx5g, t.TXWSX5H AS txwsx5h, t.TXWSX5I AS txwsx5i, t.TXWSX5J AS txwsx5j, t.TXWSX5K AS txwsx5k, t.BXWSX5A AS bxwsx5a, t.BXWSX5B AS bxwsx5b, t.BXWSX5C AS bxwsx5c, t.BXWSX5D AS bxwsx5d, t.BXWSX5E AS bxwsx5e, t.BXWSX5F AS t.BXWSX10A AS bxwsx10a, t.BXWSX10B AS bxwsx10b, t.BXWSX10C AS bxwsx10c, t.TXWSX11A AS txwsx11a, t.TXWSX11B AS txwsx11b, t.BXWSX11A AS bxwsx11a, t.BXWSX11B AS bxwsx11b, t.TBRNSR AS tbrnsr, t.TBRSRLY AS tbrsrly, t.BBRNSR AS bbrnsr, t.BBRSRLY AS bbrsrly, t.INSURANCE_COMPANY_ID AS insuranceCompanyId, t.OPERATOR AS operator, t.TBFS AS tbfs, t.JZX AS jzx, t.ZXS AS zxs, t.JFX1 AS jfx1, t.FXS1 AS fxs1, t.JFX2 AS jfx2, t.FXS2 AS fxs2, t.SALES_MAN_COMMISSION AS salesManCommission, t.SALES_MAN AS salesMan, t.YJZFDX AS yjzfdx, t.ZXYJBL AS zxyjbl, t.ZXYJJE AS zxyjje, t.FXYJBL1 AS fxyjbl1, t.FXYJJE1 AS fxyjje1, t.FXYJBL2 AS fxyjbl2, t.FXYJJE2 AS fxyjje2, t.ZHJRJBL AS zhjrjbl, t.ZHJRJJE AS zhjrjje, t.BXGSDQJL AS bxgsdqjl, t.SFYLP AS sfylp, t.LPNR AS lpnr, t.RECORDER AS recorder, t.RECORDERID AS recorderid, t.RECORDERTC AS recordertc, t.CREATE_TIME AS createTime, t.UPDATE_TIME AS updateTime, t.UPDATE_USER AS updateUser, t.REMARK1 AS remark1, t.REMARK2 AS remark2, t.REMARK3 AS remark3, t.DDR AS ddr, t.DD_DATE AS ddDate, t.BGSML AS bgsml, t.SJZFYJ AS sjzfyj, t.YJZFSJ AS yjzfsj, t.YJZFR AS yjzfr, o.user_name as userName, o.sex, o.marry_flag as marryFlag, o.birth_date as birthDate, o.cert_type as certType, o.cert_no as certNo, o.nationality, o.household, o.validity_date as validityDate, o.insured_relationship as insuredRelationship, o.resident_type as residentType, o.pprovince, o.pcity, o.pdistrict, o.postal_address as postalAddress, o.rprovince, o.rcity, o.rdistrict, o.residential_address as residentialAddress, o.telphone, o.mtelphone, o.mail, o.work_unit as workUnit, o.job_content as jobContent, o.industry, o.occupation, b.user_name as userNameB, b.sex as sexB, b.marry_flag as marryFlagB, b.birth_date as birthDateB, b.cert_type as certTypeB, b.cert_no as certNoB, b.nationality as nationalityB, b.household as householdB, b.validity_date as validityDateB, b.resident_type as residentTypeB, b.rprovince as provinceB, b.rcity as cityB, b.rdistrict as districtB, b.residential_address as residentialAddressB, b.telphone as telphoneB, b.mtelphone as mtelphoneB, b.mail as mailB, b.work_unit as workUnitB, b.job_content as jobContentB, b.industry as industryB, b.occupation as occupationB, be.beneficial_rate as beneficialRate, be.beneficial_name as beneficialName, be.sex as sexS, be.birth_date as birthDateS, be.relationship as relationship, be.cert_type as certTypeS, be.cert_no as certNoS, be.validity_date as validityDateS, be.residential_address as residentialAddressS, be.beneficiary_order as beneficiaryOrder, be.description, i.insurer_name as insuranceCompany, i.insurer_phone as insuranceCompanyTel, o.user_name as policyholder, s.user_name as salesManName, op.name as operatorName FROM order_sx t LEFT JOIN policyholder o ON t.policyholder_id = o.pid LEFT JOIN policyholder b ON t.insured_id = b.pid LEFT JOIN beneficial be ON t.beneficiary_id = be.person_id LEFT JOIN t_insurer i ON t.insurance_company_id = i.id LEFT JOIN sales_man s ON t.sales_man = s.id LEFT JOIN user op ON t.OPERATOR = op.id
t.order_id = #{id}
